tool_description: Extracts text from processed document images using optical character recognition with confidence scoring and layout preservation.

image_path.description: Path to the preprocessed image file

language.description: Primary language of the document text

preserve_layout.description: Maintain original document layout and formatting

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for character recognition (0-100)

error_messages: Image file not accessible: Verify image_path exists and is readable.
Unsupported language: Use supported language codes or 'english' as default.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0 and 100.
OCR processing failed: Image quality may be too poor for text extraction.
No text detected: Document may be blank or text is not recognizable.
Memory insufficient: Large images may require more system memory.
usage: Provide preprocessed image_path, set language to match document content, use preserve_layout for structured documents, adjust confidence_threshold lower for poor quality documents, and enable detect_handwriting for manuscript records.

extracted_text.description: Full text content extracted from the image

confidence_score.description: Overall confidence score for text extraction (0-100)

layout_regions.description: Identified text regions and their types
